name: craftily
content:

in a way that is clever, and sometimes also slightly dishonest: His parents had craftily concealed from him the fact that they were planning to rent out his room. The layout of the store is craftily designed to entice customers to buy more toys. See
crafty
More examplesFewer examplesShe plots so craftily she may go undetected for years. He befriended his housemates and craftily set them against each other. She stopped again, craftily, and waited to see if he would speak.
